name: Pick up the Pace
summary: Your group can Hustle for up to 20 minutes longer.
description:
You lead by example and can help others push themselves beyond their normal limits. When Hustling in a group during exploration mode, your group can Hustle for up to 20 additional minutes, to a maximum of the amount of time the character with the highest Constitution modifier could Hustle alone.Pick up the Pace Leads To...

Caravan LeaderTraitsGeneral: A type of feat that any character can select, regardless of ancestry and class, as long as they meet the prerequisites. You can select a feat with this trait when your class grants a general feat.
